title: Rocky Mountain Pictures
text: Rocky Mountain Pictures is an American <a href="film%20distributor">film distributor</a>. It was created by Ron Rodgers and Randy Slaughter. It was headquartered in <a href="Salt%20Lake%20City">Salt Lake City</a>, <a href="Utah">Utah</a>. It specialized in distributing <a href="conservatism">conservative</a> films. In 2016, the company was sold and moved to Chicago. Its focus changed to black, Latino and Asian-made indie films.
